Description:
The fifth edition of the cult series of fights involving sexual heroines returned after several years absence.
Dead or Alive 5 continues the series Dead or Alive, adding new characters and other innovations. From now
on, sexiest ladies are ready to scratch each other cute face, to spare no effort - All the damage are counted
correctly on the bodies of the characters, and improved physics of movement displays the techniques of
fighters, including animation breathing and acrobatic somersaults, in great detail. Modeled even sweat,
acting on the bodies of the heroines in the heat of battle. All decorations on the battle arenas are made
Ã¢â‚¬â€¹Ã¢â‚¬â€¹not just for beauty. During battles, the battlefield will change, and players will be able to use this to your
advantage - For example, you can push the enemy a severe blow to the newly created obstacles. Also in
Dead or Alive 5 fans of multiplayer modes will be able to test your skills against real players in
online combat.

Installation instructions from the disk:
1. Write the file (s) to disk.
2. Insert the disc in the console and go to the Game  Install Package Files.
3. Select the installation file, and press X.
4. Run the game through HMV.

Installation instructions with Flash cards:
1. Copy the file (s) to the media.
2. Insert Flash into the console and go to the Game  Install Package Files.
3. Select the installation file, and press X.
4. Run the game through HMV.
